messages.subject: Live & Learn registration is UP
messages.msgSnippet: You are free to register NOW! The website is still in progress (but much busier), but the registration is complete---t-shirt info and everything! You may
messages.messageBody:
You are free to register NOW!

The website is still in progress (but much busier), but the
registration is complete---t-shirt info and everything!

You may e-mail, snail mail or fax (if using the fax, you will need to
call first to allow me to turn the fax on) registrations to me .
Payment can be made via check or PayPal.

I'm looking forward to seeing who is coming this year!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
